alert.note: Alert for Dundy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 25 at 6:18PM CDT until October 26 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT /11 AM CDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Kansas, Cheyenne, Sherman, Wallace and Greeley Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any areas currently in the Advisory seeing some increased visibility will see it rapidly fall after sunset.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
